00025 #include <boost/thread/xtime.hpp>

00030 #include "Global.h"
00031 #include "RangeStatsGatherer.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Hypertable {
00034 
00035   class MaintenancePrioritizer : public ReferenceCount {
00036   public:
00037 
00038     class Stats {
00039     public:
00040       Stats() : m_access_counter(0) { start(); }
00041       void update_stats_bytes_loaded(uint32_t n) {
00042         ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00043         m_bytes_loaded += n;
00044       }
00045       void start() {
00046         m_bytes_loaded = 0;
00047         boost::xtime_get(&m_start_time, TIME_UTC);
00048         m_stop_time = m_start_time;
00049         m_access_counter = Global::access_counter;
00050       }
00051       void stop() {
00052         boost::xtime_get(&m_stop_time, TIME_UTC);
00053       }
00054       int64_t duration_millis() {
00055         return xtime_diff_millis(m_start_time, m_stop_time);
00056       }
00057       double mbps() {
00058         double mbps, time_diff = (double)xtime_diff_millis(m_start_time, m_stop_time) * 1000.0;
00059         if (time_diff)
00060           mbps = (double)m_bytes_loaded / time_diff;
00061         else {
00062           HT_ERROR("mbps calculation over zero time range");
00063           mbps = 0.0;
00064         }
00065         return mbps;
00066       }
00067       int64_t starting_access_counter() { return m_access_counter; }
00068     private:
00069       Mutex m_mutex;
00070       boost::xtime m_start_time;
00071       boost::xtime m_stop_time;
00072       uint64_t m_bytes_loaded;
00073       int64_t m_access_counter;
00074     };
00075 
00076     virtual void prioritize(RangeStatsVector &range_data, int64_t memory_needed,
00077                             String &trace_str) = 0;
00078 
00079   };
00080   typedef intrusive_ptr<MaintenancePrioritizer> MaintenancePrioritizerPtr;
00081 
00082 }
